main event: A civilian man sighted a black circular shaped object about four feet in diameter moving in a straight line at the speed of a jet aircraft over Hickam AFB, Oahu, Hawaii.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 2-3 seconds,The object's speed was estimated between 300 to 400 miles per hour,There were no accompanying sounds, lights, trails, or unusual maneuvers observed,The sighting occurred at 2105 hours on 29 September 1952,The observer was a civilian employee at Pearl Harbor with experience in conventional aircraft observation.
sighted object: black circular shaped object about four feet in diameter
witness description: civilian employee at Pearl Harbor, experience in observing conventional flying aircraft
